member.name: M:NetWork.Program.Servicer(System.String[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: this function gets an array of service names, and start or stop command, and it runs on the array and

member.name: M:NetWork.Program.StopRDP(System.Boolean)
member.summary: This Function Stops the RDP connection to the office computer. it takes 'stop' parameter. if it is true, it stops the rdp. otherwise, it starts it.
member.param: A bool parameter. it swiches between stopping (default) and starting rdp session.

member.name: M:NetWork.Program.GetProgram(System.String)
member.summary: GetProgram switches between the name and the path of the file. if the name is given, it returns the path. if the path is given, it returns the name.
member.param: file or path of the program
member.returns: path if name has given, name if path has given. empty string if found nothing.
